Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Expulsion of the products of conception before the completion of gestation without deliberate interference.
Expulsion of the product of FERTILIZATION before completing the term of GESTATION and without deliberate interference.
